I am so sick of this world using violence to answer it's problems; Please the next Generation stop them and talk. No more war, please. I am not asking
 I am pleading:

 I should be pround of this place but to be honst and rather brutal

 I am losing faith in parliament with both houses.

 I am a young lady of 25 and I am sure I not the only one together we can ask the goverment to end this pointless wars, No more violence.
 Change it do not used violence.
